detail_desc: Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Short raglan sleeves and reflective details.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester.
Jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and welt front pockets. Wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in imitation leather with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back. Asymmetric seam at the front, short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs at the elbows, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in velour with a deep V-neck and long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs. Gathered seams under the bust and at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Studio Collection. Short-sleeved shirt woven in a linen blend containing some cupro with a resort collar and buttons down the front.

Studio Collection. Wide shorts in a patterned linen and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, pleats at the top and legs with creases.
Studio Collection. Long kaftan in a linen and viscose weave containing some Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck and short sleeves.

Studio Collection. Short dress in an airy, patterned, organic cotton weave with a grandad collar. Concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a loose edge. Seam on the shoulders, long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam on the skirt.

Studio Collection. Dress in an airy, pleated weave made from recycled polyester with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a horizontal strap at the back. Wide fit with gathered, elasticated seams. Unlined.
Shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Wide legs with a small silicone appliqué.
Shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Wide legs with a small silicone appliqué.
Alice band in grained imitation leather with a knot detail on the top.
Studio Collection. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, medium coverage at the back and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Screw-top water bottle in stainless steel with a matt finish. Capacity 490 ml.
Stainless steel water bottle with a screw top lid in stainless steel and plastic. Small handle and a strap with a carabiner hook attached to the lid. Capacity 450 ml.
Fully lined swimsuit with a ribbed surface. Square neckline, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Long-sleeved, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Medium coverage at the back.

Fitted, ribbed sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.

Fitted, ribbed sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Flared skirt in textured, double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams. Unlined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey with a wrapover top, softly draped V-neck and a seam at the waist with a sewn-on belt that has decorative metal D-rings. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and open front with ties. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and open front with ties. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with a tab and press-stud fastening, four large inner compartments and three smaller inner compartments. Height 6.5 cm. Width 10 cm.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with a tab and press-stud fastening, four large inner compartments and three smaller inner compartments. Height 6.5 cm. Width 10 cm.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Short, wide dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Sporty sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sporty sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
A pair of metal earrings with a flower-shaped pendant. Length approx. 3.5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked waist with decorative bows at the sides. Jersey lining.
Dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked waist with decorative bows at the sides. Jersey lining.

Short, wide parka in nylon with a high collar, zip down the front and a wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastenings. Yoke at the front and back, large flap front pockets and wide sleeves with a tab and concealed hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Short, wide parka in nylon with a high collar, zip down the front and a wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastenings. Yoke at the front and back, large flap front pockets and wide sleeves with a tab and concealed hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Short, wide parka in nylon with a high collar, zip down the front and a wind flap with concealed hook and loop fastenings. Yoke at the front and back, large flap front pockets and wide sleeves with a tab and concealed hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Wide trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with covered elastication and sewn-in tie belt at the waist, and front pockets.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band in metal decorated with a braided satin ribbon.

Long-sleeved romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, A-line dress woven in a viscose blend with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress woven in a viscose blend with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets with a flap. 3/4-length, gently gathered sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets with a flap. 3/4-length, gently gathered sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Metal Alice band with a decorative chain detail on top. Width 1.7 cm.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.

Blouse in airy organza with a jacquard-weave pattern. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, voluminous puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The top can be detached from the blouse.

Blouse in airy organza with a jacquard-weave pattern. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, voluminous puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The top can be detached from the blouse.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Gently flared, long-sleeved dress in jersey with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Gently flared, long-sleeved dress in jersey with gathered tiers. Unlined.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Fixed hood with ear appliqués on top and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Lined. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Fixed hood with ear appliqués on top and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Lined. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Fixed hood with ear appliqués on top and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Lined. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Faux shearling-lined hood, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.

Padded all-in-one suit in a lightly brushed, patterned weave. Faux shearling-lined hood, two concealed zips down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the back of the waist. Foldover mitts at the cuffs and foldover feet at the hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece lining. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.
Adjustable belt in imitation leather with a detachable bag that has a flap with a decorative metal buckle and concealed magnetic fastener. Lined. Depth 3 cm. Height 9 cm. Width 17 cm.
Pool shoes with an imitation leather foot strap covered in sturdy jersey with a plastic print. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Open chest pocket and a gathered seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with a turtle neck and cable knitting at the top. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped hoodie in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Unlined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scallop-edged cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scallop-edged cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a polo neck, concealed press-stud at one side of the collar and press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
